remarks: ` .~ ` is a transitive relation over the set of closed walks (defined as words).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Apr-2018.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jun-2018.)
statement:
erclwwlk.r $e |- .~ = { <. u , w >. | ( u e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ w e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` w ) ) u = ( w cyclShift n ) ) } $.
erclwwlktr $p |- ( ( x .~ y /\ y .~ z ) -> x .~ z ) $.
$d E n u w $.
$d V n u w $.
$d n u w x y $.
$d n u w x z $.
